alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lowndes; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 2:14PM EDT until July 22 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Lowndes County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Thomas County in south central Georgia... Brooks County in south central Georgia... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 214 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Boston, or 8 miles west of Quitman, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Quitman, Valdosta, Boston, Dixie, Grooverville, Everett, Oaklawn, Kinderlou, Pidcock, Nankin, Empress, Brooks Co A/p and Blue Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
